CHAT.comment: The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TODD G. SCHER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SCOTT D. MAKAR ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF TODD G. SCHER ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:54 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
